name: Tap-Tap Santa
description:
Help Santa and his team of reindeer gather all the gifts while making sure they do not hit the Icicles or Chimneys!

Each gift Santa and his reindeer get is counted so you always know what your highest score is, and what score you need to beat!

Tap-Tap Santa is sure to bring AD FREE fun for all ages!

Rudolf is ready with his nose shining bright!


If you enjoy this app, your rating would be appreciated!
